title: submit valid tour request successfully
description: Test the submitTourRequest API endpoint with valid form data to ensure it validates inputs, stores the tour request in the database, and triggers an SMS notification successfully.

title: handle invalid tour request input gracefully
description: Test the submitTourRequest API endpoint with invalid or incomplete form data to verify that server-side Zod validation catches errors and returns appropriate error messages without storing data or sending SMS.

title: send sms notification with valid environment variables
description: Test the sendNotificationSMS utility function to confirm it sends SMS notifications successfully when all required NEXT_SMS environment variables are correctly set.

title: fail sms notification on missing environment variables
description: Test the sendNotificationSMS utility function behavior when required NEXT_SMS environment variables are missing or invalid, ensuring it returns detailed error messages and does not attempt to send SMS.

title: environment variables diagnostic api returns correct status
description: Test the /api/env-check GET endpoint to verify it accurately reports the presence and correctness of required NEXT_SMS environment variables in different deployment contexts (local, preview, production).
